The problem with:

java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Attempted to beginRule:
F/RemoteSystemsTempFiles/TIGER.SPYDERHOST.NET/home/elmann, does not match outer
scope rule: P/dev37

is a known one. It shows up in the following defect as well:
https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=158773

The solution to these problems will be tricky due to the nature of the rules in Eclipse and the fact that RSE uses temp files under the covers.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 170916 ***
